short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to change the playback speed of video players. Great for listening to lectures and skipping ads!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of watching videos at normal speed? If yes, then this extension is for you! Speed up your school lectures or skip annoying video ads, the sky is the limit...
